title: Drawing, 1992-107-4, ca. 1965–70
medium: Pen and blue ink, graphite on wove paper
inscribed:
At left in blue ink: " Dear John / Thank you for your letter and interest in my designs [...]"; at right various prices for pieces; at right: "BLUE-GREENS" NECKPIECE [...], "MOON CIRCLED", NECKPIECE [...], "DROPS" NECKPIECE [...].
Verso: in blue ink (letter continues): [...] The "Moon-Circled" is a new / design [...]
